author: RTÉ News
title: Trump warns China could face consequences for outbreak
description: US President Donald Trump said on Saturday that China should face consequences if it was "knowingly responsible" for the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
US President Donald Trump said on Saturday that China should face consequences if it was "knowingly responsible" for the coronavirus pandemic.
"If it was a mistake, a mistake is a mistake. But if they were knowingly responsible, yeah, I mean, then sure there… [+1605 chars]
